experience: You and Brandon both know Amanda Vega, Scott Carlson, and 100 others
I noticed one of his socks was on inside-out.
He interviewed well but I wondered...Did he take no PRIDE in his appearance? Would he take PRIDE in his work?
The other interviewers loved him...thought he was a wonderful candidate and recommended to hire.
He left my interview with a big smile on his face.  Was he TOO confident?
Last Monday was his first day.
"You know one of your socks was on inside-out," I told him.
"Yes," he said. "I realized it when I got home."
"Thank you," he told me. "I was quite nervous until I noticed your fly was down the entire time."
Quit obsessing over reasons NOT to hire someone and start focusing on the reasons TO hire them.
Why can't you trust the king of the jungle??
I'm not "Lion" when I tell you how tight the candidate market is right

now.  If you are having trouble identifying top talent for your open positions, give me a call or email.  My team and I are talking with new candidates daily that are passively looking for their next move!  Here is a quick snapshot of some of the top talent that we are working with.

·      Tax Research and compliance with tax law at federal, state and local levels
with internal reporting, strong cost analysis, and system Improvements.

Analytics Consultant at Wells Fargo
June 20, 2017, Jason Cyrus was a client of Brandon’s

I have worked with a few recruiters over my career, but Brandon was by far the most professional and willing to go the extra mile for me.  He was able to secure an amazing offer from a company in Phoenix within only 2 weeks of sending him my resume.  He is a miracle worker and very persistent on your behalf.  Brandon emailed and called while always keeping me up to date on the situation as well as supplying helpful tips for the interview process.  He was fantastic and extremely easy to work with which made the process seamless.  I would highly recommend Brandon for anyone seeking a new opportunity or to advance their career as he was instrumental in putting me in position to succeed.  If you are looking for a recruiter to get you the best offer, to follow up with you whenever there is an update or to just check on you, to act professionally at all times, and to devote time and effort on your behalf, then Brandon is your guy.
